Articles.Content:
I'm looking for a few critiques on some arrangements I've made. Right now I'll start off with something simple: Dance of the Holyman.

I did this recently, about 1.8 cycles ago. It's from Castlevania IV, but only arranged on piano, so not quite as impressive as the original.

Please give feedback on how this sounds to you. Don't be afraid to let me have it. An artists' growth depends on accurate feedback.

Here's the link: https://www.noteflight.com/scores/view/bf2215340671f0474f1f775bc7931e7a24a73072

If you have an account, you can also tell me there.
